Name: Legendary Knight - 傳奇騎士
About the game: The enemy is invading our territory, and the king leads his men to resist. The king takes on the responsibility of defending his homeland. Vowing to expel tons of enemy forces away from our country, and guard the sacred statues that symbolize our ruling power. During the preparation time, the king can Purchase various props, Train the army to enhance combat effectiveness Assign generals and his subordinates to protect buildings Use the experience gained on the battlefield to learn different skills to improve his and his soldiers' combat capabilities. Passing all waves is your only way to win. 'Village' has 25 rounds and 'Fortress' has 40 rounds. If the statue is destroyed or the king dies, you will be defeated immediately. Good Luck!
